purpose: Post-phone-call follow-up emails for candidates Eric calls today

templates.subject_line: Follow-up: Limited-scope Section 850 petition review + Dec 3 appearance
templates.email_body:
Hi,

I left you a voicemail earlier today about a limited-scope Section 850 Heggstad petition matter. I'm following up in writing as requested.

I saw your website specifically mentions Section 850 petitions as a specialty, which is exactly what I need. I'm a successor trustee with a finalized Heggstad petition ready to file in LA Superior Court. The hearing is scheduled for December 3, 2025.

What I'm looking for:
- Procedural compliance review of the petition (caption, venue, notice timing under Section 851, relief alignment including Section 859)
- One-time special appearance at the December 3rd hearing
- Withdrawal under CRC 3.35-3.37 after the hearing

Case background:
- Real property (17742 Berta Canyon Rd, Salinas) needs to be transferred into Judy Jones Trust
- Property listed on trust schedule but not formally transferred before grantor's death
- Financial elder abuse elements with written admission from opposing counsel
- Seeking $10,650 return + device turnover + Section 859 double damages + RUFADAA order

I have the full packet ready for conflict screening:
- Heggstad petition (finalized)
- DE-115 (prepared)
- Proof of Service drafts
- All exhibits compiled

My budget is $2,000-$3,000 for the limited-scope review and court appearance.

Can you handle this on a limited-scope basis? If so, please let me know your fee structure and I'll send the full packet immediately.

Thank you,

Eric B. Jones
Successor Trustee, Judy Jones Trust
626-348-3019
eric@recovery-compass.org
